elementSpec.desc: specifies class membership of the parent element or class.
specifica l'appartenenza a una classe dell'elemento o classe genitori
especifica la pertenencia a una clase del elemento o clase padre.
親要素や親クラスを示す．

attDef.desc: specifies the identifier for a class of which the documented element or class is a member or subclass
indica l'identificatore di una classe di cui l'elemento o classe indicati sono un membro o una sottoclasse
especifica el identificador de una clase de la cual el elemento o clase indicados son un miembro o una subclase.
(名前) 当該要素やクラスの親要素や親クラスを指定する．
specifies the effect of this declaration on its parent module.
especifica el efecto de esta declaración en el módulo del que obtiene el orígen (módulo padre)
当該宣言が親要素に与える影響を示す．

valItem.desc: this declaration is added to the current definitions
la declaración se añade a las definiciones corrientes.
(当該宣言は現行定義に追加される．)
this declaration and all of its children are removed from the current setup
la declaración y todos sus descendientes son excluidos de la disposición corriente.
(当該宣言と当該以下の子要素は，現行定義から外される．)

exemplum.p: This element will appear in any content model which references model.divLike, and will have attributes defined in att.identified (in addition to any defined explicitly for this element).

remarks.p: Elements or classes which are members of multiple (unrelated) classes will have more than one memberOf element, grouped by a classes element. If an element is a member of a class C1, which is itself a subclass of a class C2, there is no need to state this, other than in the documentation for class C1.
Any additional comment or explanation of the class membership may be provided as content for this element.
